Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Galvatron seemed almost screwed over. Literally, and his eyes showed it as 
Megatron powered up his gun. The betrayal of Empath had left him vulnerable. 
This Megatron was not worthy of such a kill. The jewel on his chest powered 
up as much as it could with the distraction of Empath's powers. It would have 
been enough to keep him from being annihilated but escape would have been his 
only option. Then the light came. From the blip he had felt from Megatron's 
body. It engulfed him and Megatron. He suddenly felt his body dissolve. His 
spark being the only thing remaining. He  saw Megatron's body do the same. 
There sparks both engulfed by this artifacts light that was now spinning 
in-between the spark. He felt a new shell being formed around the two sparks. 
For the first time..Galvatron was afraid.

--part1_22.2e716777.2aacb75b_boundary
